channel.title: Xenomorph
channel.description: Xenomorph is your go-to Discord bot when it comes to cryptography, hashing, encoding and more!

item.title: Version 0.0.1-alpha released
item.description:
We are happy to announce the release of Xenomorph 0.0.1-alpha!

This is a pre-release version of Xenomorph, which is still under
item.content:encoded:
We are happy to announce the release of Xenomorph 0.0.1-alpha!

This is a pre-release version of Xenomorph, which is still under daily development. It contains a few commands, 4 to be precise, but we are working daily on the bot so that it will offer brand new commands that you may have never seen on a bot before :D

We‚Äôve added some basic commands to showcase what to expect in the future from this bot. Below are the biggest changes for this release, of course we‚Äôve fixed bugs üêõ

Caesar Cipher

You can encode, decode and even bruteforce a string (in case you forgot the shift used üòâ) with the Caesar cipher.

Here is a basic example of encoding a string:

And here is a basic example of bruteforcing a string:

Help

Just like every other bot on Discord, we have a basic, for now, help command:

More

We are working on more commands, so stay tuned!
